document_data.Summary: [[Candlemas]] and [[Sysquemalyn]], servants of the powerful [[Netherese]] archmage [[Polaris]], begin betting on the life of [[Sunbright Steelshanks]], a barbarian warrior. Sysquemalyn sends frequent deadly challenges, while Candlemas sends him to investigate the One King, a conquerer who has united orcs and humans. Sunbright joins with the half-elf Greenwillow on the way. She is lost in the [[Nine Hells]] when Sysquemalyn conjures a [[Demiplane]] that opens portals to the Hells throughout [[Netheril]]. Polaris rescues the other three, flaying Sysquemalyn alive. Sunbright allies with Candlemas to find Greenwillow again.
